text: Ngempela abakholwa labo abathi, “uMvelinqangi yena unguMesiya indodana kaMariya” futhi uMesiya wathi, “Oh bantwana bakwa-Israyeli! Khonzani uMvelinqangi iNkosi yami noyiNkosi yenu ngempela lowo ewenzela uMvelinqangi abahlanganyeli ekumkhonzeni ngakho-ke uMvelinqangi umnqabele izulu futhi indawo yakhe yokuhlala kuyoba umlilo futhi izoni angeke zibenabasizi
